topics.title: MiNiFi Agent Packaging and Layout
topics.summary: Describe how MiNiFi assemblies are built, what binaries they include, and how the runtime directory is structured.
topics.research_request: Outline distribution contents, NAR dependencies, and platform-specific launcher support for MiNiFi.

topics.title: Configuration Schema and Flow Serialization
topics.summary: Explain MiNiFi configuration formats, schema evolution, and how flows map to runtime components.
topics.research_request: Describe YAML and JSON schemas, version transitions, and tooling that generates MiNiFi configs.

topics.title: Bootstrap and Lifecycle Management
topics.summary: Document bootstrap scripts, lifecycle hooks, and service wrappers that manage MiNiFi processes.
topics.research_request: Explain startup scripts, Windows service helpers, and failure recovery behaviors for MiNiFi agents.

topics.title: Command and Control Integration
topics.summary: Describe how MiNiFi agents communicate with the C2 framework for configuration updates and monitoring.
topics.research_request: Detail protocols, heartbeats, and required configuration for connecting MiNiFi to C2 services.

topics.title: Flow Specification Tooling
topics.summary: Summarize tooling that generates, converts, and validates MiNiFi flow specifications.
topics.research_request: Explain conversion from NiFi templates, schema validation, and deployment workflows for MiNiFi flows.

topics.title: Status Reporting and Diagnostics
topics.summary: Explain MiNiFi status reporting features, periodic reporters, and how diagnostics are surfaced.
topics.research_request: Catalog available status reporters, query interfaces, and recommended monitoring integrations.

topics.title: Security and Sensitive Property Handling
topics.summary: Detail MiNiFi security options including bootstrap protections, sensitive property handling, and TLS configuration.
topics.research_request: Explain how MiNiFi secures credentials, configures TLS, and integrates with NiFi security policies.

topics.title: Edge Provenance and Repository Options
topics.summary: Describe provenance capture on MiNiFi agents, repository layouts, and strategies for forwarding lineage data.
topics.research_request: Clarify provenance storage limits, export mechanisms, and coordination with centralized NiFi clusters.

topics.title: Resource Management on Constrained Devices
topics.summary: Explain strategies for CPU, memory, and disk management tailored to MiNiFi's lightweight footprint.
topics.research_request: Provide guidance on tuning thread counts, queue limits, and repository sizing for constrained hardware.

topics.title: Docker Delivery for MiNiFi
topics.summary: Summarize official container builds, configuration via environment variables, and deployment examples for MiNiFi Docker images.
topics.research_request: Document Dockerfiles, compose samples, and runtime configuration toggles for containerized MiNiFi.

topics.title: Integration Testing Framework
topics.summary: Describe the automated test suites validating MiNiFi flows, processors, and controller services.
topics.research_request: Explain test harness structure, scenarios covered, and how to execute the integration suite.

topics.title: Upgrade and Migration Guidance
topics.summary: Detail recommended approaches for upgrading MiNiFi agents and coordinating changes with central NiFi deployments.
topics.research_request: Outline rolling upgrade strategies, compatibility considerations, and rollback plans for MiNiFi fleets.
